title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 462.12 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 462.12 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) Copies of
records or personal information shall be provided: (1)
at a rate of 25 cents per page of up to 9
x 14 inches; or
(2)
upon payment of
the actual cost of reproduction, if the record or personal information cannot
be photocopied. (b) The
cost of mailing copies of records or personal information shall be borne by the
data subject requesting such records or personal
information. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
462.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
